tasks.label: curl gallery api
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "try { $res = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri http://localhost:3000/api/public/gallery?take=3 -UseBasicParsing; Write-Host $res.StatusCode; Write-Output $res.Content } catch { Write-Host 'ERR'; Write-Output $_.Exception.Message }"
